privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Protection of your personal data
privacy.introduction: As Softiel, protecting the privacy of our visitors and customers is one of our most important priorities. This privacy policy explains what personal data we collect, how we process it, and your rights under the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 (KVKK) and the European Union General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

section1.title: 1. Data Collected
section1.description: The following personal data may be collected through our website:
section1.name: Full Name
section1.cookies: Cookies (IP address, browser information, session data, etc.)
section1.note: No data is collected through artificial intelligence bots except for the information you share through the contact form.

section2.title: 2. Data Processing Purposes
section2.description: Your collected personal data is processed for the following purposes:
section2.customer: Responding to customer requests and communicating
section2.quotes: Preparing quotes and establishing business relationships
section2.analytics: Performing analytics and performance measurements (through Google Analytics)

section3.title: 3. Cookies and Analytics
section3.description: Our website only uses cookies within the scope of Google Analytics service. These cookies are processed to improve user experience and measure site performance. You can manage your cookie settings from your browser options.

section4.title: 4. Data Retention Period
section4.description: Your personal data is stored as long as the customer relationship continues. When the relevant business relationship ends, your data will be deleted or anonymized.

section5.title: 5. User Rights
section5.description: Under KVKK and GDPR, you have the following rights over your personal data:
section5.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at

section6.title: 6. Data Transfer
section6.description: Our website is hosted in Europe, and processing of your data is limited to the following countries:
section6.turkey: Turkey (within the scope of business processes)
section6.note: Other than this, your data is not transferred to any third country.

section7.title: 7. Security Measures
section7.description: As Softiel, we take the necessary administrative and technical security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or misuse.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.description: You can contact us for questions or requests about our privacy policy:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Service usage terms and obligations
terms.introduction: These terms of service apply to all users who visit the Softiel website (hereinafter referred to as "Site"). Anyone who accesses and uses the Site is deemed to have accepted the conditions specified below.

section1.title: 1. Scope of Service
section1.description: Through the Softiel website, users can;
section1.note: benefit from these services. Users do not have the right to perform any operations on the Site other than these services.

section2.title: 2. User Responsibilities
section2.accurate: Users undertake to provide only accurate and up-to-date information through the Site.
section2.prohibited: Spam, abuse, sending harmful content, or any behavior that would disrupt the Site's operation is prohibited.
section2.legal: Use of the Site for purposes other than its intended purpose, unauthorized access attempts, and similar situations may be subject to legal sanctions.

section3.title: 3. Copyright
section3.rights: All rights to all content on the Site (text, images, logos, code, design, etc.) belong to Softiel.
section3.permission: No content may be copied, reproduced, distributed, or used for commercial purposes without written permission from Softiel.

section4.title: 4. Service and Content Changes
section4.description: Softiel reserves the right to make changes to the services, prices, content, and terms of use offered on the Site without prior notice.

section5.title: 5. Disclaimer
section5.info: All information on the Site is for general information purposes only.
section5.liability: Softiel cannot be held responsible for any direct or indirect damages that may arise from possible errors or deficiencies in the content or from the use of this information.

section6.title: 6. Third-Party Links
section6.description: The Site may contain third-party links such as Google Maps and social media accounts. These links are managed by Softiel and are provided to improve user experience.

section7.title: 7. Disputes and Legal Authority
section7.description: In any disputes arising from these terms of service, the Laws of the Republic of Turkey will apply. The competent authorities are Istanbul courts and enforcement offices.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.description: You can contact us for all your questions and requests regarding the terms of service:

cookie.title: Cookie Policy
cookie.subtitle: Information about cookies used on our website
cookie.introduction: As Softiel, we use cookies to improve the experience of users who visit our website, measure site performance, and improve our services. This Cookie Policy has been prepared within the scope of the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 (KVKK) and the European Union General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

section1.title: 1. What is a Cookie?
section1.description: Cookies are small text files that are saved to your browser or device when you visit a website. Thanks to these files, the site can remember your preferences and improve your user experience.

section2.title: 2. Types of Cookies Used
section2.essentialDesc: These are cookies necessary for the site to perform its basic functions. Functions such as logging in and submitting forms do not work without these cookies.
section2.functionalDesc: It personalizes the site for you by remembering your preferences (e.g., language selection, display settings).
section2.analyticsDesc: It anonymously collects users' movements on the site (traffic analysis, pages visited, browsing times) through Google Analytics. This helps us improve site performance and user experience.
section2.marketingDesc: It helps us measure the effectiveness of advertising and campaign activities by analyzing user behavior.

section3.title: 3. Purposes of Cookie Usage
section3.description: The collected data is used for the following purposes:
section3.measure: Measuring visitor count and traffic sources,

section4.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
section4.description: Only third-party cookies within the scope of Google Analytics service are used on our site. These cookies collect anonymous statistical data and do not disclose your personal identity information.

section5.title: 5. Cookie Storage Duration
section5.description: Cookies are stored for the duration of the session and are automatically deleted when the browser is closed.

section6.title: 6. Cookie Management
section6.description: Users can reject cookies or delete existing cookies through browser settings. We remind you that if you disable cookies, some parts of the site may not work correctly.

section7.title: 7. Legal Basis and Compliance
section7.description: Cookie usage is carried out in accordance with legal obligations within the scope of KVKK and GDPR. Users can exercise their rights regarding cookies at any time and request information from us.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.description: You can contact us for your questions about our Cookie Policy:

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Plans
pricing.description: Choose the plan that suits you and bring your project to life.
pricing.notice: Domain + SSL + hosting fees are not included in the package
pricing.whatsappPackage: I want to get information about the package.

description.0: Discover the most suitable pricing options for your project.
description.1: Bring your project to life with packages suitable for every budget.

basic.name: Basic – Digital Starter Package
basic.description: For newly established businesses or small brands that need an online presence. This package provides basic digital visibility.

features.1: Logo & Corporate Identity (logo + color palette + business card)
features.4: 1 month social media starter support (profile editing, 4 posts)

pro.name: Pro – Digital Growth Package
pro.description: For brands that already exist digitally but want traffic, visibility and engagement.

features.0: Website Design (Pro level: custom homepage + blog)

enterprise.name: Enterprise – Digital Transformation Package
enterprise.description: For corporate businesses and companies that want to expand to global markets. Goal: digital systematization, automation and integration.

features.3: Social Media Management (4 platforms, professional content + advertising)

faq.title: What You're
faq.description: We answered the most frequently asked questions about pricing.

0.question: How is pricing calculated?
0.answer: Our pricing is determined based on the complexity of your project, number of pages and special features. Basic package starts from $1,000, Pro package $2,000, and Enterprise package starts from $3,000. We do custom pricing for special projects.

1.question: What payment options are available?
1.answer: You can pay 50% upfront, 50% after delivery.

2.question: What is the project delivery time?
2.answer: Basic package is delivered in 7-14 days, Pro package in 14-21 days, and Enterprise package in 21-30 days. Duration may vary depending on project complexity.

3.question: Are hosting and domain included?
3.answer: No, hosting and domain fees are not included in packages. We provide consulting on suitable hosting and domain options for you. We have hosting installation and management services.

4.question: Is there support after the project?
4.answer: Yes! We provide free support for 1 month in Basic package, 3 months in Pro package, 6 months in Enterprise package. Small updates and bug fixes are free. We also have monthly maintenance packages.

5.question: What is the cancellation and refund policy?
5.answer: If cancelled before the project starts, 100% refund is given. After the project starts, payment is taken for the completed part only. Your revision rights are determined according to the package contents.

6.question: Is SEO service included?
6.answer: Basic package includes basic SEO settings, Pro package includes monthly SEO work, Enterprise package includes full SEO management. We also have monthly SEO packages.

7.question: Is there social media management?
7.answer: Yes! Basic package includes 1 month social media starter support, Pro package includes 2 platforms 8 posts/month, Enterprise package includes 4 platforms professional content + advertising management.

8.question: Do you offer multilingual support?
8.answer: Yes! We set up infrastructure in all languages. We offer support for Turkish, English, German, French, Arabic and Russian. Enterprise package includes multilingual infrastructure.

0.name: Rika Matbaa
0.content: A modern website design tailored to the printing industry, reflecting corporate identity. A structure that increases customer interaction by professionally showcasing products and services in the digital environment.

1.name: Palyacco Dünyası
1.content: An energetic, colorful website for the event and organization sector. Successfully reflects the brand's fun side to the digital world with a user-friendly structure that highlights clown services.

2.name: Candleiyj
2.content: A project supporting social media sales through Instagram posts and Shopier store management. Strongly created digital showcase effect through visual harmony, brand language and product presentation.

3.name: Nevaa Yazılım
3.content: Modern frontend design for corporate website and CRM application for a software company. A work that reflects the company's technology vision with a user experience-focused, simple yet professional interface.

4.name: Hesapify
4.content: Comprehensive digital structure developed for a software company: website, blog content, ERP application interface, YouTube video editing and Instagram management. A project that strengthens the brand's digital presence in many ways.

5.name: Bot Group
5.content: Strong and corporate website design for the logistics sector. The company's reliable and professional image has been transferred to the digital world by presenting service scope, fleet information and operational processes in a simple structure.

6.name: Yusuf İnci
6.content: An elegant and minimalist website prepared for an architecture office. Strongly reflects the brand's design understanding by combining aesthetics, functionality and professionalism with a design that highlights the project portfolio.

7.name: Ayşe Korkmaz
7.content: We had our education platform built by Softiel. The user interface is very user-friendly and our students are very happy. I definitely recommend it.

8.name: Oğuz Demir
8.content: Softiel developed our health application. Patient tracking is now very easy. Doctors and patients are very satisfied. Their professional approach is commendable.

9.name: Gamze Şahin
9.content: We had our financial management application built by Softiel. Security and ease of use are excellent. Our customer satisfaction reached 95%.

10.name: Emre Yılmaz
10.content: We renewed our logistics tracking system with Softiel. Thanks to the real-time tracking feature, our customer complaints decreased by 80%.

11.name: Deniz Öztürk
11.content: We had our real estate portfolio management system built by Softiel. Our sales processes accelerated and customer experience improved significantly.

12.name: Ali Çelik
12.content: We had our restaurant management application built by Softiel. Order tracking and customer satisfaction increased significantly. Great work!

13.name: Seda Kaya
13.content: We had our beauty brand's e-commerce site built by Softiel. Our sales increased by 200% and customer experience is excellent.

14.name: Murat Özkan
14.content: We renewed our consulting firm's website with Softiel. Thanks to the professional appearance and user-friendly interface, our customer count increased.

15.name: Ebru Şahin
15.content: We had our gym's mobile application built by Softiel. Member tracking and program management is now very easy. Our customers are very happy!

16.name: Kemal Demir
16.content: We renewed our car gallery's website with Softiel. Vehicle catalog and sales processes improved significantly. I definitely recommend it.

17.name: Pınar Yıldız
17.content: We had our event planning platform built by Softiel. Customer reservations and event management is now very easy. Great work!

18.name: Berk Çelik
18.content: We renewed our law firm's website with Softiel. Professional appearance and customer portfolio improved significantly. Thanks Softiel!

19.name: Zeynep Arslan
19.content: We had our pet shop's e-commerce site built by Softiel. Product catalog and sales processes are excellent. Our customers are very happy!
